entry.value: DELETE FROM LAKEHOUSE.REPORT.IOC_DB_LV2_AN WHERE KY_BAOCAO='Y' AND THOIGIAN= ${v_nam}

INSERT INTO LAKEHOUSE.REPORT.IOC_DB_LV2_AN( LOAD_TIME, KY_BAOCAO, THOIGIAN, NAM, THANG, TUAN, LOAIAN, LOAI_AN_TEN, LOAI_TOA, FLAG_ST_PT, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_ID, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_TEN, TOA_CAP_CHA_ID, TOA_CAP_CHA_TEN, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_LOAITOA, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TONG_HUY_SUA, TONG_HUY_SUA_CUNGKY, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG1, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG2, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG3, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG4, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG5, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG6, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG7, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG8, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG9, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG10, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG11, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG12 ) SELECT CURRENT_TIME() AS LOAD_TIME, 'Y' KY_BAOCAO, CAST(TH.NAM AS BIGINT) AS THOIGIAN, CAST(TH.NAM AS BIGINT) AS NAM, CAST(NULL AS BIGINT) AS THANG, CAST(NULL AS BIGINT) TUAN, TH.LOAIAN, TH.LOAI_AN_TEN, TH.LOAI_TOA, TH.FLAG_ST_PT, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_ID, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_TEN, TH.TOA_CAP_CHA_ID, TH.TOA_CAP_CHA_TEN, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_LOAITOA, TH.TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, TH.TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TH.TONG_HUY_SUA, TH.TONG_HUY_SUA_CUNGKY, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG1, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG2, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG3, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG4, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG5, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG6, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG7, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG8, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG9, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG10, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG11, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG12 FROM VW_IOC.VW_IOC_LV2_AN_YEAR TH WHERE NAM= ${v_nam}

INSERT INTO LAKEHOUSE.REPORT.IOC_DB_LV1_TOATINH ( NAM, ID_TOA_TINH, TEN_TOA_TINH, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET ) SELECT NAM, ID_TOA_TINH, TEN_TOA_TINH, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET FROM VW_IOC.VW_IOC_LV1_AN_TOATINH WHERE NAM= ${v_nam}

INSERT INTO LAKEHOUSE.REPORT.IOC_DB_LV2_AN( LOAD_TIME, KY_BAOCAO, THOIGIAN, NAM, THANG, TUAN, LOAIAN, LOAI_AN_TEN, LOAI_TOA, FLAG_ST_PT, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_ID, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_TEN, TOA_CAP_CHA_ID, TOA_CAP_CHA_TEN, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_LOAITOA, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TONG_HUY_SUA, TONG_HUY_SUA_CUNGKY, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG1, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG2, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG3, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG4, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG5, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG6, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG7, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG8, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG9, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG10, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG11, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG12 ) SELECT CURRENT_TIME() AS LOAD_TIME, 'W' KY_BAOCAO, CAST(TH.TUAN AS BIGINT) AS THOIGIAN, CAST(NULL AS BIGINT) AS NAM, CAST(NULL AS BIGINT) AS THANG, CAST(TH.TUAN AS BIGINT) TUAN, TH.LOAIAN, TH.LOAI_AN_TEN, TH.LOAI_TOA, TH.FLAG_ST_PT, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_ID, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_TEN, TH.TOA_CAP_CHA_ID, TH.TOA_CAP_CHA_TEN, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_LOAITOA, TH.TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, TH.TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TH.TONG_HUY_SUA, TH.TONG_HUY_SUA_CUNGKY, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG1, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG2, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG3, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG4, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG5, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG6, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG7, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG8, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG9, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG10, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG11, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG12 FROM VW_IOC.VW_IOC_LV2_AN_WEEK_HIENTAI TH

INSERT INTO LAKEHOUSE.REPORT.IOC_DB_LV1 (NAM, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TOANBO, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_THEO_NAM, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNAM_AN_KHAC, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNAM_AN_HC, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNAM_AN_HS, XXTT_TONG_THANG1, XXTT_TONG_THANG2, XXTT_TONG_THANG3, XXTT_TONG_THANG4, XXTT_TONG_THANG5, XXTT_TONG_THANG6, XXTT_TONG_THANG7, XXTT_TONG_THANG8, XXTT_TONG_THANG9, XXTT_TONG_THANG10, XXTT_TONG_THANG11, XXTT_TONG_THANG12, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNGAY, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_DANGXX_TRONGNGAY, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_HINHSU, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_DANSU_MORONG, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_HANHCHINH, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_BPXLHC, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_HINHSU, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_DANSU_MORONG, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_HANHCHINH, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_BPXLHC, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, QUOCHOI_AN_CHITIEU_AN_HINHSU, QUOCHOI_AN_CHITIEU_AN_DANSU_MORONG, QUOCHOI_AN_CHITIEU_AN_HANHCHINH, TROLYAO_TONG_SOLUONG_MAHOA, TROLYAO_TONG_CAUHOI_DAGUI, TROLYAO_TONG_CAUHOI_DADUYET, TROLYAO_TONG_SOLUOT_HOIDAP, HOAGIAI_TONG_YEUCAU, HOAGIAI_TONG_THANH, HOAGIAI_TONG_KHONGTHANH, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TRONGTUAN, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TICHCUC_TRONGTUAN, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TIEUCUC_TRONGTUAN, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TRUNGLAP_TRONGTUAN, TCCB_TONG_BIENCHE_DUOCGIAO, TCCB_TONG_BIENCHE_HIENCO, TCCB_TONG_THAMPHAN, TCCB_TONG_THAMTRAVIEN, TCCB_TONG_THUKYVIEN, TCCB_TONG_CONGCHUC_VIENCHUC_KHAC, TCCB_TONG_DANGVIEN, TCCB_TONG_NGUOI_LAODONG, GTTT_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, GTTT_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, GTTT_TONG_CONLAI, VBDH_TONG_DEN, VBDH_TONG_DI, VBDH_TONG_DEN_DAXULY, VBDH_TONG_DEN_CHUAXULY, CBBAQD_TONG_BANAN_QUYETDINH_TOANBO, CBBAQD_TONG_BANAN_QUYETDINH_TRONGNAM, CBBAQD_TONG_LUOT_TRUYCAP) SELECT NAM, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TOANBO, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_THEO_NAM, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNAM_AN_KHAC, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNAM_AN_HC, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNAM_AN_HS, XXTT_TONG_THANG1, XXTT_TONG_THANG2, XXTT_TONG_THANG3, XXTT_TONG_THANG4, XXTT_TONG_THANG5, XXTT_TONG_THANG6, XXTT_TONG_THANG7, XXTT_TONG_THANG8, XXTT_TONG_THANG9, XXTT_TONG_THANG10, XXTT_TONG_THANG11, XXTT_TONG_THANG12, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_TRONGNGAY, XXTT_TONG_PHIEN_DANGXX_TRONGNGAY, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_HINHSU, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_DANSU_MORONG, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_HANHCHINH, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_BPXLHC, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_HINHSU, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_DANSU_MORONG, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_HANHCHINH, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_BPXLHC, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, AN_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, AN_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, QUOCHOI_AN_CHITIEU_AN_HINHSU, QUOCHOI_AN_CHITIEU_AN_DANSU_MORONG, QUOCHOI_AN_CHITIEU_AN_HANHCHINH, TROLYAO_TONG_SOLUONG_MAHOA, TROLYAO_TONG_CAUHOI_DAGUI, TROLYAO_TONG_CAUHOI_DADUYET, TROLYAO_TONG_SOLUOT_HOIDAP, HOAGIAI_TONG_YEUCAU, HOAGIAI_TONG_THANH, HOAGIAI_TONG_KHONGTHANH, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TRONGTUAN, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TICHCUC_TRONGTUAN, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TIEUCUC_TRONGTUAN, GSKGM_TONG_TIN_TRUNGLAP_TRONGTUAN, TCCB_TONG_BIENCHE_DUOCGIAO, TCCB_TONG_BIENCHE_HIENCO, TCCB_TONG_THAMPHAN, TCCB_TONG_THAMTRAVIEN, TCCB_TONG_THUKYVIEN, TCCB_TONG_CONGCHUC_VIENCHUC_KHAC, TCCB_TONG_DANGVIEN, TCCB_TONG_NGUOI_LAODONG, GTTT_TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, GTTT_TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, GTTT_TONG_CONLAI, VBDH_TONG_DEN, VBDH_TONG_DI, VBDH_TONG_DEN_DAXULY, VBDH_TONG_DEN_CHUAXULY, CBBAQD_TONG_BANAN_QUYETDINH_TOANBO, CBBAQD_TONG_BANAN_QUYETDINH_TRONGNAM, CBBAQD_TONG_LUOT_TRUYCAP FROM VW_IOC.VW_IOC_LV1_PHAN1 WHERE NAM= ${v_nam}
SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE(),'YYYY') AS NAM, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE(),'YYYYMM') NAMTHANG
DELETE FROM LAKEHOUSE.REPORT.IOC_DB_LV2_AN WHERE KY_BAOCAO='M' AND THOIGIAN= ${v_namthang}

INSERT INTO LAKEHOUSE.REPORT.IOC_DB_LV2_AN( LOAD_TIME, KY_BAOCAO, THOIGIAN, NAM, THANG, TUAN, LOAIAN, LOAI_AN_TEN, LOAI_TOA, FLAG_ST_PT, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_ID, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_TEN, TOA_CAP_CHA_ID, TOA_CAP_CHA_TEN, TOA_GIAI_QUYET_LOAITOA, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TONG_HUY_SUA, TONG_HUY_SUA_CUNGKY, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG1, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG2, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG3, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG4, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG5, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG6, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG7, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG8, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG9, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG10, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG11, TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG12 ) SELECT CURRENT_TIME() AS LOAD_TIME, 'M' KY_BAOCAO, CAST(TH.NAMTHANG AS BIGINT) AS THOIGIAN, CAST(TH.NAM AS BIGINT) AS NAM, CAST(TH.THANG AS BIGINT) AS THANG, CAST(NULL AS BIGINT) WEEK, TH.LOAIAN, TH.LOAI_AN_TEN, TH.LOAI_TOA, TH.FLAG_ST_PT, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_ID, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_TEN, TH.TOA_CAP_CHA_ID, TH.TOA_CAP_CHA_TEN, TH.TOA_GIAI_QUYET_LOAITOA, TH.TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET, TH.TONG_PHAI_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TH.TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_CUNGKY, TH.TONG_HUY_SUA, TH.TONG_HUY_SUA_CUNGKY, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG1, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG2, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG3, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG4, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG5, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG6, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG7, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG8, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG9, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG10, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG11, NULL AS TONG_DA_GIAIQUYET_THANG12 FROM VW_IOC.VW_IOC_LV2_AN_MONTH TH WHERE NAMTHANG = ${v_namthang}
